sentence.idiomatic: I don't have any in stock. You'll have to wait for two days.
Ours are all spot transactions.
The things here are all in stock.
The speech he gave has taught us a lot.
This world is too big, and our knowledge is also too limited.
I gained a lot of experience on this trip.
These cell phones were all smuggled in.
He specializes in the smuggling business.
Recently the government is cracking down hard on smuggling activities.
They are working hard to create a top-grade corporation.
We provide first-rate service.
In the future, this will be built into a world top-grade high technology park.
Investments have risks.
The biggest issue is how much risk you can afford to take.
They are discussing how it would be possible to reduce the risk of the investment.
We provide all kinds of self-defense equipment.
This product is small and easy to use. It is suitable for females to use for self-defense.
She thinks learning taekwondo is not only a good form of exercise, but also useful for self-defense.
He was arrested by the police for intentionally harming people.
He was arrested for smuggling.
In the course of this operation, the police arrested 15 people altogether.
Who is the undercover agent amongst them?
Working undercover is dangerous.
He was assigned to serve as an undercover agent.
Wanna buy a piece?
What do you think—that’s what people come here for. Got any?
You want it, we got it. You can take a look now. Everything’s in stock.
Is it safe?
Relax. Come with me.
Whoa! You really have everything here.
That’s what I told you, right?
What kind of guns are these?
This one is a Type 54 handgun. That one is a submachine gun, smuggled in from Russia. The quality is totally top-notch.
Seems you’ve got a lot of nerve! You even keep this kind of thing in your home.

word.literal: people in this line of work have no choice

sentence.idiomatic: Hey, people in this line of work have no choice. When you do this kind of business you have to take risks. Which gun do you wanna buy?
It’s for self-protection. A small caliber handgun would be fine.
What do you think of this one?
Don’t move! Put your hands up! You’ve been surrounded by the special forces police unit!
You’re illegally trafficking in firearms. You are now under arrest.
What? You’re an undercover agent!

word.literal: people in this line of work have no choice
